<<<<<<< HEAD
A proclamation for calling out heretors &c. for His Majesties service Proclamations. 1688-10-03 Scotland. Sovereign (1685-1688 : James VII) James II, King of England, 1633-1701. Scotland. Privy Council.
1 sheet ([1] p.)
printed by the heir of Andrew Anderson, printer to His most sacred Majesty, Edinburgh : anno Dom. 1688.
At end of text: Given under our signet, at Edinburgh, the third day of October, 1688. And of our reign the fourth year. Steele notation: Arms 235; King Command will. Reproduction of original in the Folger Shakespeare Library, Washington, D.C..
=======
A proclamation for calling out heretors &c. for His Majesties service Proclamations. 1688-10-03 Scotland. Sovereign (1685-1688 : James VII) James II, King of England, 1633-1701. Scotland. Privy Council.
1 sheet ([1] p.)
printed by the heir of Andrew Anderson, printer to His most sacred Majesty, Edinburgh : anno Dom. 1688.
At end of text: Given under our signet, at Edinburgh, the third day of October, 1688. And of our reign the fourth year. Steele notation: Arms 235; King Command will. Reproduction of original in the Folger Shakespeare Library, Washington, D.C..
His most sacred Majesty
the heir of Andrew Anderson
